overview: Andy Lee Meat Muscle & Mayhem. Brand new and available to download now. All scenes also playing in Triga Instant. 140 mins of absolute Andy Lee in all his glory.  This guy is smashing the internet with his meaty fat tool, muscles and tattoos. From Saturday Night Special to Union Jack Off, this film showcases his massive talents in more way than one. Includes previously unreleased footage.  Watch Andy whooping about his mammoth tool and shooting his creamy cum left right and centre. If you like your blokes built like a brick shit house, covered in fit arse tattoos and with a cheeky grin and swagger this release will keep you beating your meat for the next few months. Enjoy.
title: Andy Lee: Meat, Muscle & Mayhem
